languages.text: "Ксенос, говорящий загадками, направил меня сюда, суля воссоединение с тобой, Домин'{name}".
"The xenos who speaks in riddles sent me here. He assured me that it would lead to our reunion, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "Ксенос, говорящий загадками, направил меня сюда, суля воссоединение с тобой, Домин'{name}".

traits.locale_text: "The xenos who speaks in riddles sent me here. He assured me that it would lead to our reunion, Domin'{name}."
"The xenos who speaks in riddles sent me here. He assured me that it would lead to our reunion, Domin'{name}."
"The xenos who speaks in riddles sent me here. He assured me that it would lead to our reunion, Domin'{name}."
"The xenos who speaks in riddles sent me here. He assured me that it would lead to our reunion, Domin'{name}."
"The xenos who speaks in riddles sent me here. He assured me that it would lead to our reunion, Domin'{name}."
"The xenos who speaks in riddles sent me here. He assured me that it would lead to our reunion, Domin'{name}."

languages.text: «Me ha enviado el xenos que habla en acertijos. Me aseguró que así volveríamos a reunirnos, Domin'{name}».
languages.original_text: "The xenos who speaks in riddles sent me here. He assured me that it would lead to our reunion, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: «Me ha enviado el xenos que habla en acertijos. Me aseguró que así volveríamos a reunirnos, Domin'{name}».

languages.text: 「なぞなぞのような言葉を喋る異種族が、私をここに送り込んだ。ここに行けば私達が再開するだろうと、自信たっぷりに言っていたよ、ドミン{name}」
languages.original_text: "The xenos who speaks in riddles sent me here. He assured me that it would lead to our reunion, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: 「なぞなぞのような言葉を喋る異種族が、私をここに送り込んだ。ここに行けば私達が再開するだろうと、自信たっぷりに言っていたよ、ドミン{name}」

languages.text: “是那个说谜语的异形让我来这里的。他向我保证，说我们会再次相聚，秘者{name}。”
languages.original_text: "The xenos who speaks in riddles sent me here. He assured me that it would lead to our reunion, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: “是那个说谜语的异形让我来这里的。他向我保证，说我们会再次相聚，秘者{name}。”

languages.text: "Der Xenos, der in Rätseln spricht, schickt mich. Er hat mir versichert, es würde zu unserer Wiedervereinigung führen, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "The xenos who speaks in riddles sent me here. He assured me that it would lead to our reunion, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: "Der Xenos, der in Rätseln spricht, schickt mich. Er hat mir versichert, es würde zu unserer Wiedervereinigung führen, Domin'{name}."

languages.text: « C'est le xénos qui parle en énigmes qui m'a envoyée ici. Il m'a assurée que nous nous y retrouverions, Domin'{name}. »
languages.original_text: "The xenos who speaks in riddles sent me here. He assured me that it would lead to our reunion, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: « C'est le xénos qui parle en énigmes qui m'a envoyée ici. Il m'a assurée que nous nous y retrouverions, Domin'{name}. »

languages.text: "Bilmeceler hâlinde konuşan zeno beni buraya gönderdi. Bu şekilde yeniden bir araya gelebileceğimiz konusunda beni temin etti Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "The xenos who speaks in riddles sent me here. He assured me that it would lead to our reunion, Domin'{name}."
